title: I can't fix my Resolution ingame? PLEASE HELP

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body: Everything was fine till the patch came out. It's too zoomed in at the max I can scroll out, even changing the resolution settings won't work.

replies.body:
Can you try this?

1) Open your game.cfg file in notepad (default location: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config)
2) Change WindowMode=0 to WindowMode=1 and save it
3) Launch into game and go into options > video
4) Select a resolution from the drop down
5) Change Windowed Mode back to full screen, if desired

This is a fix for an issue with mac clients in 7.9, the issue is due to be fixed in 7.10. There's no guarantee this works but it is based on a similar issue with resolution settings.
Will this be fixxed on the next patch? I really want to play, I can't play much on my pc at home at the momment

Not unless we get to the bottom of the problem. If you're still experiencing this issue I'd like to get a copy of your game.cfg file.

The next patch is not likely to fix this problem. So I've replied to your ticket to help gather the logs so we can take a look.

It comes up with no applications able to open this file.

Yea it won't be opened just by double clicking it. You would need to use TextEdit on mac:

1) Navigate to your Applications folder and double-click TextEdit. Your TextEdit window opens.
2) Press cmd+O. The Open dialog appears.
3) Navigate to the desired text file and double-click the filename to load it.

How to fix in 2 easy steps.

1: Throw Mac out the window.
2: Buy a PC.
